abstract: Olympus is under scrutiny for series of deals involving former banker Nobumasa Yokoo which caused company to lose hundreds of millions of dollars; Yokoo runs a consulting firm Olympus hired to advise it on acquisitions; documents show that Yokoo directed the company into buying unrelated, money-losing start-ups it quickly wrote off.
snippet: A tale of well-connected advisers and puzzling deals.
lead_paragraph: A tale of well-connected advisers and puzzling deals.
